description: Photoshop CS5 includes several lighting preset files which are stored in the /​Presets/​Lights/​ directory. Preinstalled P3L files include: Blue Lights.p3l CAD Optimized.p3l Cold.p3l Dawn.p3l Day Lights.p3l Default Lights.p3l Fire.p3l Hard Lights.p3l Lush.p3l Mardi Gras.p3l Night Lights.p3l Primary Colors.p3l Purple Faze.p3l Red Lights.p3l White Lights.p3l
